name: Where's My Spaceship
description:
Grapple asteroids back to your drop off. Teleport through wormholes to collect points, but watch out! You could arrive at a different screen!

Team (Alphabetical)

Jed Dawson, William Goddard, Layton Hawkes, Steve Last, Michael Szewczyk

Four player (Xbox 360). From the #fab48hr 2015.

Originally exhibited w/ 4 screen support (4 PC networked + multiscreen support). This version has been made split screen for your accessibility.
